levelList.name: Ejecución Sentenciada
levelList.desc: Si el objetivo tiene 6+ de [Vibration], Poder de Moneda +1

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Si la suma de la Potencia y Contador de [Vibration] del objetivo es 20 o más alto, provoca [Switch_Vibration] en el objetivo, convirtiendo el [Vibration] en [VibrationCollapse]
([Switch_Vibration] : Convierte [Vibration] o [Vibration] ya convertido en un objetivo a un diferente tipo de [Vibration]. Los valores de Potencia y Contador se transfieren con la conversión.)

levelList.name: Requiem
levelList.desc:
[WinDuel] Heal 10 SP
[BeforeUse] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], activate 'Lament, Mourn, and Despair' instead
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on the target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +7% more damage for every [Coffin] on self (max 70%)
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [Coffin]
[EndSkill] If this Skill attack kills the target, gain 2 [Coffin]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target has [WanderingFootsteps], inflict +2 [Sinking] Count
[EnemyKill] Inflict ([Sinking] on killed target/3) Sinking on 2 random enemies (max 3)

levelList.name: Requiem

levelList.name: O Dullahan...!
levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] If this unit does not have [NightPathfinding], gain 1 [NightPathfinding] next turn (once per turn)
[EndBattle] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose [NightPathfinding]

levelList.name: O Dullahan...!
levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
<style="highlight">[BeforeUse] If this unit has [NightPathfinding] and has 15+ SP, use Lament, Mourn, and Despair as Counter (once per turn)</style>
[StartBattle] If this unit does not have [NightPathfinding], gain 1 [NightPathfinding] next turn (once per turn)
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1</style>
[EndBattle] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose [NightPathfinding]

levelList.name: O Dullahan...!
levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[BeforeUse] If this unit has [NightPathfinding] and has 15+ SP, use Lament, Mourn, and Despair as Counter (once per turn)
[StartBattle] If this unit does not have [NightPathfinding], gain 1 [NightPathfinding] next turn (once per turn)
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on the target (max 2)</style>
<style="highlight">[WinDuel] Gain [AttackUp] next turn equal to (# of Clashes/3) (max 3, once per turn)</style>
[EndBattle] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose [NightPathfinding]

levelList.name: Lament, Mourn, and Despair
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Lose 15 SP
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 5 [Sinking] on the target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal more damage the further this unit's SP value is from 45 (+0.3% more damage for every missing SP, max 21%)
[WhenUse] Deal +7% more damage for every Coffin on self (max 70%)
[WhenUse] Deal +10% more damage for every [NightPathfinding] on self (max 30%)
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [Coffin]
[EndSkill] If this Skill attack kills the target, gain 2 [Coffin]
[EndSkill] At less than 0 SP, heal 10 SP. When at less than 0 SP, heal more SP the further this unit's SP value is from 0 (heal 1 additional SP for every missing SP; max 25)
[EndBattle] Lose [NightPathfinding]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Raise the target's Stagger Threshold by 20% of damage dealt
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Gloom Affinity damage equal to [Sinking] on target (max 15)
[EnemyKill] Inflict ([Sinking] on killed target/3) Sinking on 2 random enemies (max 4)
